news.headline: NCLA Wins Prestigious Mellor Prize for Ending Chevron Deference
news.summary: Washington, DC, Aug. 26, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Today, the State Policy Network (SPN) and the Institute for Justice (IJ) awarded the first-ever “Chip Mellor Prize for Excellence in Public Interest Litigation” to the New Civil Liberties Alliance.
